verse.name: v1
verse.lines: God you are my God and I will ever praise You (X2)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will seek you in the morning
I will learn to walk in your ways

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And step by step you lead me
And I will follow you all of my days
I will follow you all of my days (X2)
